postarr.content: The development is temporarily paused because I need to work on CCC.
Mah, it doesn't matter. But I added time.

Two things I really want to finish before I move on to the preparation of CCC. One is to make this blogging thing work automatically so that I don't have to upload json file to GitHub everytime I post stuff; the other one is to add a section with some useful links under 'GitHub'.
I think it is better to write a light program in order to help write those posts. XD
This panel for posting is online now.
